attributes.action: Saltburn & East Cleveland Residents against - Parking Restrictions
attributes.additional_details:
Saltburn-By-The-Sea- Say NO to parking restrictions, Parking meters kill town, destroy local shops. and inconvenience residents, this group if for all Saltburn people to chat, and plan action against REDCAR COUNCIL as one unified group.
Description
This page plans the following:
1: Please send us your objections by using our facebook wall, we will then print them and send them recorded delivery.
2: Arrange proper consultation in a meeting hall with tea and coffee like real people who have earned the right to be treated like a community, not sent to a hidden trailer.
3: Take legal action as a town, when we say NO we mean NO.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority, rather than central Government.  The e-petition system is for petitions to be addressed to the Government and garner signatures, rather than as a discussion forum or advertising for a campaign.
